description.en: The arid continent of Indar is home to multiple biomes, providing unique challenges for its combatants.
Hossin's dense mangrove and willow forests provide air cover along its many swamps and highlands.
Amerish's lush groves and rocky outcroppings provide ample cover between its rolling plains and mountain passes.
Esamir's expanses of frigid tundra and craggy mountains provide little cover from airborne threats.
Experiment with all weapons, vehicles and attachments in your empire's own VR Training simulator.
